channel.title: Need halp getting a command
channel.description:
hi everybody. i need plz that someone could help me make a command that i could just type into the command which items will get with 1 command+amount of each item into their bank? i just want gm's and higher be forbidden of spawning items but will get some items into their bank as wolcoming them as gm's. ty.
1 more question is how can i make someone with a command in game as a g'm or co-owner or even donator or somethin for limited time and giving them some amount of donator points?
thx for help and i'm holding my fingers so someone could help me plz.
thx a lot to those who will help.

item.title: Need halp getting a command
item.dc:creator: @i_call_dueces i call dueces
item.description:
@i_call_dueces wrote:

[quote=“yoavassor, post:5, topic:528145”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646896.msg4350306#msg4350306 date=1376525708]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("welcomegm") && isGlobalModerator == true) {
    if (globalModeratorCollectedItem == false) {
         madeUpMethodAddItemToBank(xItem, yAmount);
         globalModeratorCollectedItem = true;
     } else {
         sendMessage("You can't collect these items twice!"); 
         return;
     }
}

[/quote]
oh wow’ thumbs up.
this should be great.
i’ll try it in a momeny.
btw.
if i want to make a few items in this commands should i just have copy paste this sentences?

     madeUpMethodAddItemToBank(xItem, yAmount);
     globalModeratorCollectedItem = true;[/quote]

madeUpMethodAddItemToBank(xItem, yAmount);

that would be the only one you would have to make duplicates of.
make sure you rename the method though, doubt theres a method called ’ madeUpMethodAddItemToBank’ made to distribute items.
either way, the boolean is just to ensure they got their items. kind of like how once you get your starter, you trigger a variable to ensure you dont get another starter

Read full topic

item.title: Need halp getting a command
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("welcomegm") && isGlobalModerator == true) {
    if (globalModeratorCollectedItem == false) {
         madeUpMethodAddItemToBank(xItem, yAmount);
         globalModeratorCollectedItem = true;
     } else {
         sendMessage("You can't collect these items twice!"); 
         return;
     }
}
